works.description: The main parts of my page "Photovoltaik: Pro und contra", which contains two large tables with text about advantages and disadvantages of photovoltaics, has been copied literally (or almost literally) in two parts on two pages - table one, "Argumente für die Photovoltaik" on page No. 1 , "Argumente gegen die Photovoltaik" on page No. 2.
